mapper.update: UPDATE user SET is_disabled = 1, update_by = #{disabledBy}, update_time = #{disableTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_disabled = 0
UPDATE user SET is_disabled = 0, update_by = #{enabledBy}, update_time = #{enableTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_disabled = 1
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM user WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE role = 'admin' AND is_disabled = 0
SELECT id, username, role FROM user WHERE is_disabled = 0
SELECT id, username, role, is_disabled FROM user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, salt, role, create_time, create_by, is_disabled) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{role}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{isDisabled})
